main event: A round-shaped disc object was observed overhead in Nashville, Tennessee, on April 22, 1965.
interesting points: The object had a size comparable to the full moon and was silvery-white in color., The object displayed erratic flight behavior, including straight flight for 15 seconds and hovering before rapidly departing., The estimated velocity of the object was around 2000 mph., Witnesses reported seeing a reddish object moving to the east., The total duration of the sighting was approximately 50 seconds.
witness description: Insufficient details on witnesses; analysis ongoing.
